reviewText: TWO TOP BANANAS originally aired in January of 1982. This burlesque-style TV special featured Don Rickles, Don Adams, Carol Wayne and a cast of unknowns in a variety of blackout skits, musical numbers and comedy routines. Of interest now primarily for its two stars, who were not only close friends but worked well together on stage. (Ap. running time: 40 mins.) As of 4/09, "Two Top Bananas" was not available on DVD. Related items: Don Knotts revived his Maxwell Smart character for the film, THE NUDE BOMB. Cast includes Bill Dana, Rhonda Fleming and Joey Forman. Scripted by Mel Brooks and Buck Henry. (VHS) (DVD) In the WWII comedy KELLY'S HEROES (1970), Don Rickles is SSgt. Crapgame, opposite Clint Eastwood, Telly Savalas and Donald Sutherland. (VHS) (DVD)
